verses.t: Great{H1419} is Lordthe {H3068}, and greatly{H3966} to be praised{H1984} in the city{H5892} of our God{H430}, in the mountain{H2022} of his holiness{H6944}.for: or, of
Beautiful{H3303} for situation{H5131}, the joy{H4885} of the whole earth{H776}, is mount{H2022} Zion{H6726}, on the sides{H3411} of the north{H6828}, the city{H7151} of the great{H7227} King{H4428}.
God{H430} is known{H3045} in her palaces{H759} for a refuge{H4869}.
For, lo, the kings{H4428} were assembled{H3259}, they passed by{H5674} together{H3162}.
They saw{H7200} it, and so they marvelled{H8539}; they were troubled{H926}, and hasted away{H2648}.
Fear{H7461} took hold{H270} upon them there, and pain{H2427}, as of a woman in travail{H3205}.
Thou breakest{H7665} the ships{H591} of Tarshish{H8659} with an east{H6921} wind{H7307}.

As we have heard{H8085}, so have we seen{H7200} in the city{H5892} Lordof the {H3068} of hosts{H6635}, in the city{H5892} of our God{H430}: God{H430} will establish{H3559} it for{H5704} ever{H5769}. Selah{H5542}.
We have thought{H1819} of thy lovingkindness{H2617}, O God{H430}, in the midst{H7130} of thy temple{H1964}.
According to thy name{H8034}, O God{H430}, so is thy praise{H8416} unto the ends{H7099} of the earth{H776}: thy right hand{H3225} is full{H4390} of righteousness{H6664}.
Let mount{H2022} Zion{H6726} rejoice{H8055}, let the daughters{H1323} of Judah{H3063} be glad{H1523}, because of thy judgments{H4941}.
Walk about{H5437} Zion{H6726}, and go round about{H5362} her: tell{H5608} the towers{H4026} thereof.

Mark{H7896} ye well{H3820} her bulwarks{H2430}, consider{H6448} her palaces{H759}; that ye may tell{H5608} it to the generation{H1755} following{H314}.Markâ€¦: Heb. Set your heart toconsider: or, raise up
For this God{H430} is our God{H430} for ever{H5769} and ever{H5703}: he will be our guide{H5090} even unto death{H4192}.
